Title: Multi-touch GIS API for TableTops
Description:
This API facilitates the creation of multi-touch GIS applications for digital Tabletops. 
It is built on top of ESRI API for WPF 4.0 and it uses Windows 7 touch events. It also uses some gestures from the Gesture Toolkit.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This API facilitates the creation of multi-touch GIS applications for digital Tabletops.
It is built on top of ESRI API for WPF 4.0 and it uses Windows 7 touch events. It also uses some gestures from the Gesture Toolkit.

Where to go next!
  • Learn about the design of the API
  • Download and start using the API
  • Read more details on the user interface features of the API
  • Know more about the development process and future plans

Related publications
  • eGrid: Supporting the Control Room Operation of a Utility Company With Multi-Touch Tables
  • A Test-Driven Approach for Extracting Libraries of Reusable Components from Existing Applications

Update: Nov 21 2012
  • eGrid has been migrated to the ASE Lab's new main source repository at Github .
